page.title: 04Drainage
page.content: Surface water disposal from the area into the River Eden was, until January 1985, effected by a system of drainage organised and paid for by the 'Burgh-by-Sands, Beaumont and Orton Drainage Board', to which land occupiers subscribed. On the above date the responsibility passed to the North West Water Authority because of short-comings in the carrying out of duties by the former board. (S.1. 1985/681) A housewife was absolved from paying drainage charges recently. The decision will affect other people in the area whose properties are connected to cesspits and septic tanks for the disposal of effluent.
